generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Eat Mob Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity to eat a specified Mob.

fields.title: Eat Animation Time
fields.description: Sets the time in seconds the eat animation should play for.

fields.title: Eat Mob Sound
fields.description: Sets the sound that should play when eating a mob.

fields.title: Loot Table
fields.description: The loot table for loot to be dropped when eating a mob.

fields.title: Pull In Force
fields.description: Sets the force which the mob-to-be-eaten is pulled towards the eating mob.

fields.title: Reach Mob Distance
fields.description: Sets the desired distance to be reached before eating the mob.

fields.title: Run Speed
fields.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the target.
